law.text: Any person convicted of an offense in KRS 529.100 or 529.110 shall be ordered to pay, in addition to any other fines, penalties, or applicable forfeitures, a human trafficking victims service fee of ten thousand dollars ($10,000) to be remitted to the fund created in KRS 529.140.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 8, effective June 25, 2013.
